name: Greek Property Exchange (GPE)
tag_list: real-estate, property, greece, greek, ellada, akinita, buy, sell, rent, rental, villa, apartment, house, database, website, agents, realtors, estate-agents, lawyers, law, legal, media, stroumboulis
overview:
GreekPropertyExchange.com (Greek Property Exchange - GPE) is the leading real estate and property website dedicated to the Greek and Cypriot real estate industry. GPEâ€™s registered members include Greece and Cyprusâ€™ top real estate agents, realtors, independent sellers, architects, developers, construction companies and others that advertise residential, land and commercial listings for buying, selling and rental purposes for all of Greece and Cyprus.

GPE is a real estate listing database that is advertised in the top Greek diaspora and international markets around the world and targets interested investors - making it easier for foreigners to start their Greek property search. GPE is a useful website resource for people looking to buy, sell or rent property in Greece and Cyprus.

GPE has been featured in many Greek media outlets (newspapers, magazines, websites, television and radio) including Athens News, Naftemporiki Newspaper, Kerdos Newspaper, Isotimia Newspaper, Vradyni Newspaper, Elefterotypia Newspaper, Imerisia Newspaper, Ta Nea Newspaper, Ethnos Newspaper, GRReporter.com, Neos Kosmos Newspaper, GreekReporter.com, DailyFrappe.com, Radio Neo Show and on television with Antenna (ANT1) Satellite TV for its work to help strengthen the Greek real estate industry from around the world. Please visit GreekPropertyExchange.com for more information and to start searching, or creating your very own advertisement, for property listings in Greece.
